Sentencas: A multiphysics model for a production scale planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack is important for the SOFC technology, but usually requires an unpractical amount of computing resource.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The major cause for the huge computing resource requirement is identified as the need to solve the cathode O-2 transport and the associated electrochemistry.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: To overcome the technical obstacle, an analytical model for solving the O-2 transport and its coupling with the electrochemistry is derived.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The analytical model is used to greatly reduce the numerical mesh complexity of a multiphysics model.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Numerical test shows that the analytical approximation is highly accurate and stable.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: A multiphysics numerical modeling tool taking advantage of the analytical solution is then developed through Fluent (R).
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The numerical efficiency and stability of this modeling tool are further demonstrated by simulating a 30-cell stack with a production scale cell size.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Detailed information about the stack performance is revealed and briefly discussed.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The multiphysics modeling tool can be used to guide the stack design and select the operating parameters.
Titulo: Efficient Mass Transport and Electrochemistry Coupling Scheme for Reliable Multiphysics Modeling of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack
